lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Speaking here after a meeting of the 11-nation Cartagena group, Marcano said he was aware of political pressure at home to reduce debt payments but did not think such a move would benefit Venezuela.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In Caracas there have recently been calls to invoke the agreement's contingency clause which the government used last year to amend the original terms after a 40 pct drop in oil income.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said Venezuela now obtains trade credit lines without a government guarantee, something that Argentina and others are just starting to try to negotiate in their restructuring packages.
